code: import{applyMiddleware,combineReducers,createStore}from"redux";import messagePostReducer from"../messagePostReducer";import postCreatReducer from"../postCreatReducer";import usersReducer from"../usersReducer";import authReducer from"../authReducer";import thunk from"redux-thunk";import{reducer as formReducer}from"redux-form";import appReducer from"../appReducer";import{composeWithDevTools}from"redux-devtools-extension";var reducer=combineReducers({post:postCreatReducer,dialogsMessage:messagePostReducer,usersPage:usersReducer,auth:authReducer,form:formReducer,app:appReducer});var store=createStore(reducer,composeWithDevTools(applyMiddleware(thunk)));export default store;
